sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const BehavingInSocialMedia = () => { return (

Tagpros is an online platform that spans different social media outlets. Because of this, we want to make sure that we post content that adheres to our{' '} Community Standards {' '} and welcomes everyone who can see it.

As a teacher, you should understand that your profession does not end after class. This means that even outside of the classroom, you still have the responsibility to embody the values of a model teacher when interacting with members of Tagpros. Because of this, we have a teacher social media policy that gives you guidelines on what to observe in the social media space as a Tagpros teacher.

  • Always maintain respectful interactions with other people. Do not create unnecessary conflict.
  • Always assume the best intention of others. Social media has the dangers of miscommunication due to its online nature. It is best to first understand others before responding.
  • Do not share personal information regarding the parents or students in Tagpros.

If an issue is reported to us that you exhibited behavior that violates this policy or our{' '} Community Standards . We reserve the right to sanction you or even remove you from the platform.{' '}

If you have concerns about the online behavior of another community member, please make a report to{' '} customercare@tagpros.us . Please note that while Tagpros will investigate and determine an appropriate course of action, we will not engage in discussions about the outcome nor discuss any other contexts in which we implement this policy.

); }; export default BehavingInSocialMedia;
